name: The Lost Journal
description:
THE LOST JOURNAL is a 2-D side scrolling adventure game that tells a story of friendship, identity, family, and acceptance, while you, the player, is tasked with answering journaling prompts throughout the narrative. Explore exciting forest environments, interact with interesting characters, and solve a mystery that ties into an age-old forest legend…

Journey into the forest playing as Amelia, an aspiring botanist with a thirst for adventure. With her trusty field journal and her keen eyes, she begins her quest to discover new plants. Amelia’s journey takes a turn when she stumbles upon torn pages detailing of magical forest ruin, and the mysterious character who they belong to…
